title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 601.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 601.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to regulate the use of the
water resources of the State pursuant to article 15, title 15 of the

Environmental Conservation Law by implementing a water withdrawal permitting, registration and reporting program for water withdrawals equaling or exceeding
a threshold volume. This Part also implements New York's obligation under the

Great Lakes-St. Lawrence River Basin Water Resources Compact to create a
regulatory program for water withdrawals in the Great Lakes-St. Lawrence River

Basin pursuant to article 21, title 10 of the Environmental Conservation

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
601.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
